sources.title: Operation Crossbow (1965) George Peppard · Sophia Loren
sources.description: In 1943, three hand-picked agents parachute into Holland on a sabotage mission to counter the German missile threat.   A lavish American film that tells its interesting story with sufficient suspense right up to the overly sensational ending.

metadata.Plot: This is the story of the methods used to defeat Hitler's V1 (doodlebug) and V2 (rocket) "revenge weapons" towards the end of World War II. Even though the Nazis were in retreat, these weapons could have turned their defeat into victory. This movie includes references to Hannah Reich, who was a German test pilot in real-life.
metadata.Writer: Duilio Coletti, Vittoriano Petrilli, Emeric Pressburger
metadata.Actors: Sophia Loren, George Peppard, Trevor Howard
